modName: Dark Souls Motion (Walk Run and Sprint)
summary: These motions are similar to Dark Souls Style for walking and running.
descriptionHtml:
[center][list]
[*]
[/list][/center]
===================[b] OVERVIEW [/b]=================
These motions are similar to Dark Souls Style for walking and running, and I wanted to share them for the dark souls fans out there.

I have seem many people asking for these across some niche Skyrim channels and it seems like they never cared to help others acquire said motions so i will be the one to help those who may have wanted these animations.



[list]
[*]This Animation set will change the Forward motions and left and right motions. NOT the moving back motions.
[*]To Complete the moving back motions i would HIGHLY recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73399?tab=files]RAYSR Animations[/url]﻿ for all the moving backward motions( Walk and Run).
[*]I would also recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62797/?tab=files]DSer Animations [/url]﻿for the one-handed idle in the video, as well as more Dark Souls-ish animations.
[/list]
I can not properly credit who made these motions as they seem to be very scarce with no clear origin. I do believe that these were made quite some time ago and i would deem this animations as "Long Lost Animations" until stated otherwise. 

Well that's its I Hope you enjoy the animations, and if you may need assistant just ask :)
author: GD Animations
